includedAssets.title: Pilot
includedAssets.synopsis: A pair of socially awkward physicists have their lives turned upside down when an aspiring actress moves in across the hall.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: A pair of socially awkward physicists have their lives turned upside down when an aspiring actress moves in across the hall.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: A pair of socially awkward physicists have their lives turned upside down when an aspiring actress moves in across the hall.

includedAssets.title: The Big Bran Hypothesis
includedAssets.altTitle: S1, Ep2 - The Big Bran Hypothesis
includedAssets.synopsis: Sheldon becomes deeply concerned by Penny's messy apartment after he and Leonard drop off a package for her.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Sheldon becomes deeply concerned by Penny's messy apartment after he and Leonard drop off a package for her.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Sheldon becomes deeply concerned by Penny's messy apartment after he and Leonard drop off a package for her.

includedAssets.title: The Fuzzy Boots Corollary
includedAssets.altTitle: S1, Ep3 - The Fuzzy Boots Corollary
includedAssets.synopsis: Leonard is devastated when he suspects Penny has a new boyfriend, so the guys try to convince him to look for love elsewhere.

includedAssets.title: The Luminous Fish Effect
includedAssets.altTitle: S1, Ep4 - The Luminous Fish Effect
includedAssets.synopsis: Sheldon is fired after insulting his new boss and sinks into depression, forcing Leonard to call his mother.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Sheldon is fired after insulting his new boss and sinks into depression, forcing Leonard to call his mother.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Sheldon is fired after insulting his new boss and sinks into depression, forcing Leonard to call his mother.

includedAssets.title: The Hamburger Postulate
includedAssets.synopsis: Leonard and Leslie have a romantic encounter during a rehearsal after she asks him to be the new cellist in her string quartet.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Leonard and Leslie have a romantic encounter during a rehearsal after she asks him to be the new cellist in her string quartet.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Leonard and Leslie have a romantic encounter during a rehearsal after she asks him to be the new cellist in her string quartet.

includedAssets.title: The Middle Earth Paradigm
includedAssets.altTitle: S1, Ep6 - The Middle Earth Paradigm
includedAssets.synopsis: Penny invites the guys to a Halloween costume party, forcing them to socialise with her cool friends, with mixed results.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Penny invites the guys to a Halloween costume party, forcing them to socialise with her cool friends, with mixed results.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Penny invites the guys to a Halloween costume party, forcing them to socialise with her cool friends, with mixed results.

includedAssets.title: The Dumpling Paradox
includedAssets.synopsis: When Howard hits it off with Penny's friend Christy, Sheldon panics that the guys will be unable to function as an odd number.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: When Howard hits it off with Penny's friend Christy, Sheldon panics that the guys will be unable to function as an odd number.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: When Howard hits it off with Penny's friend Christy, Sheldon panics that the guys will be unable to function as an odd number.

includedAssets.title: The Grasshopper Experiment
includedAssets.synopsis: Raj discovers the power of cocktails after his parents attempt to set him up on a date with a childhood friend.

includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Raj discovers the power of cocktails after his parents attempt to set him up on a date with a childhood friend.

includedAssets.title: The Cooper-Hofsadter
includedAssets.synopsis: Leonard and Sheldon argue after Leonard says he wants to present their joint research paper at an academic conference.

includedAssets.title: The Loobenfeld Decay
includedAssets.synopsis: Sheldon makes up an elaborate lie to avoid hearing Penny sing after she is cast in a production of Rent.

includedAssets.title: The Pancake Batter Anomaly
includedAssets.altTitle: S1, Ep11 - The Pancake Batter Anomaly
includedAssets.synopsis: When Sheldon gets sick, Leonard sneaks out to watch a Planet of the Apes marathon, leaving Penny to look after him.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: When Sheldon gets sick, Leonard sneaks out to watch a Planet of the Apes marathon, leaving Penny to look after him.

includedAssets.title: The Jerusalem Duality
includedAssets.synopsis: Sheldon is driven to change careers when a 15-year-old child prodigy invited to the university turns out to be smarter than him.

includedAssets.title: The Bat Jar Conjecture
includedAssets.altTitle: S1, Ep13 - The Bat Jar Conjecture
includedAssets.synopsis: When Sheldon is kicked off the guys' physics bowl team, he forms his own to take his friends down.

includedAssets.title: The Nerdvana Annihilation
includedAssets.synopsis: Leonard puts his collectables up for sale when Penny gets angry at the guys after they buy a full-size replica time machine.

includedAssets.title: The Pork Chop Indeterminacy
includedAssets.altTitle: S1, Ep15 - The Pork Chop Indeterminacy
includedAssets.synopsis: The guys bicker when Sheldon's attractive twin sister comes to town, while Raj joins a drug trial to cure his selective mutism.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: The guys bicker when Sheldon's attractive twin sister comes to town, while Raj joins a drug trial to cure his selective mutism.

includedAssets.title: The Peanut Reaction
includedAssets.synopsis: After Penny discovers Leonard has never had a birthday party, she sets out to plan a surprise for him.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: After Penny discovers Leonard has never had a birthday party, she sets out to plan a surprise for him.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: After Penny discovers Leonard has never had a birthday party, she sets out to plan a surprise for him.

includedAssets.title: The Tangerine Factor
includedAssets.synopsis: Penny and Leonard go to Sheldon for dating advice after she finally agrees to go on a date with him.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Penny and Leonard go to Sheldon for dating advice after she finally agrees to go on a date with him.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Penny and Leonard go to Sheldon for dating advice after she finally agrees to go on a date with him.

includedAssets.title: Season 1
includedAssets.synopsis: Leonard and Sheldon, a pair of socially awkward physicists, find their lives turned upside down when an aspiring actress, Penny, moves in across the hall. First season of the smash-hit US comedy from the creator of Two and a Half Men. Johnny Galecki, Jim Parsons and Kaley Cuoco star.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: When a young woman moves in across the hall, two socially awkward physicists find their lives turned upside down. Jim Parsons and Kaley Cuoco star.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Leonard and Sheldon, a pair of socially awkward physicists, find their lives turned upside down when an aspiring actress, Penny, moves in across the hall. First season of the smash-hit US comedy from the creator of Two and a Half Men. Johnny Galecki, Jim Parsons and Kaley Cuoco star.

includedIn.title: The Big Bang Theory
includedIn.synopsis: Socially awkward physicists Sheldon and Leonard begin to explore the world outside of their lab and apartment when a beautiful waitress moves in across the hall.
includedIn.shortSynopsis: Socially awkward physicists Sheldon and Leonard have their lives turned upside down when a beautiful waitress moves in across the hall.
includedIn.mediumSynopsis: Socially awkward physicists Sheldon and Leonard begin to explore the world outside of their lab and apartment when a beautiful waitress moves in across the hall.
